center.bold: Martin Klein, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Lorraine Priest, Defendant-Appellee.

court.center: Appellate Court of Illinois, First District.

opinion.posture:
Appeal from the Municipal Court of Chicago, First Municipal District of the Circuit Court of Cook County; the Hon. GEORGE A. BLAKEY, Judge, presiding.
Order reversed.
opinion.attorneys:
Eugene K. Landenberger, of Chicago, for appellant;
No brief filed for appellee.

opinion_text.bold: Not to be published in full.
